name: Pale Di Potato
description: Crispy Fried Potato Wedges with skin marinated in flavourful spices

name: Sourdough Herbs Garlic Bread
description: Artisanal sourdough, naturally fermented for a rich tangy flavor, baked crispy with garlic butter and aromatic herbs.

name: Sourdough Bruschetta
description: Artisanal sourdough, baked crispy, brushed with garlic, freshly chopped tomatoes, olive oil and herbs.

name: Lemon Butter Ravioli
description: Handmade ravioli drizzled with a rich lemon butter sauce.

name: Pan Fried Noodles
description: Crispy golden brown noodle served with a flavourful savoury gravy.

name: Chocochip Cookie with Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Cocoa rich large cookie baked warm and served with Vanilla Ice Cream.

name: Oatmeal cookie with Vanilla Ice Cream
description: Chewy and wholesome oatmeal cookie. A perfect blend of warmth and texture.

name: Creme Caramel
description: Silky smooth caramel custard with a rich, golden caramel glaze. A perfect balance of sweetness and creaminess.
